item.title: Roadside Assistance via Satellite Expands to Australia
item.description: Roadside Assistance via Satellite is now available in Australia, allowing Australian iPhone users to get help if their car breaks down in an area without Wi-Fi or cellular service. According to Apple,

item.title: Apple Extends Free Access to Satellite Features Across iPhone 14 and iPhone 15 Models
item.description: Apple today announced it is providing existing iPhone 14 and iPhone 15 users with an additional year of free access to its suite of satellite features. The company revealed this extension in its press
